019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common;
020
021import com.google.gson.Gson;
022import io.kubernetes.client.Discovery;
023import io.kubernetes.client.apimachinery.GroupVersionKind;
024import io.kubernetes.client.custom.V1Patch;
025import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiClient;
026import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException;
027import io.kubernetes.client.util.Strings;
028import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.GenericKubernetesApi;
029import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.KubernetesApiResponse;
030import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.options.PatchOptions;
031import java.util.Optional;
032import java.util.function.Function;
033
034/**
035 * A stub for namespaced custom objects.
036 */
037@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis")
038public class K8sObjectStub {
039    private final GenericKubernetesApi<K8sObjectState, K8sObjectStates> api;
040    private final String group;
041    private final String version;
042    private final String kind;
043    private final String plural;
044    private final String namespace;
045    private final String name;
046
047    /**
048     * Instantiates a new namespaced custom object stub.
049     * @param group the group
050     * @param version the version
051     * @param plural the plural
052     * @param namespace the namespace
053     * @param name the name
054     */
055    protected K8sObjectStub(ApiClient client, String group, String version,
056            String kind, String plural, String namespace, String name) {
057        this.group = group;
058        this.version = version;
059        this.kind = kind;
060        this.plural = plural;
061        this.namespace = namespace;
062        this.name = name;
063
064        Gson gson = client.getJSON().getGson();
065        if (!checkAdapters(client)) {
066            client.getJSON().setGson(gson.newBuilder()
067                .registerTypeAdapterFactory(
068                    new K8sObjectStateTypeAdapterFactory())
069                .create());
070        }
071        api = new GenericKubernetesApi<>(K8sObjectState.class,
072            K8sObjectStates.class, group, version, plural, client);
073    }
074
075    private boolean checkAdapters(ApiClient client) {
076        return K8sObjectStateTypeAdapterFactory.K8sObjectStateCreator.class
077            .equals(client.getJSON().getGson().getAdapter(K8sObjectState.class)
078                .getClass())
079            && K8sObjectStateTypeAdapterFactory.K8sObjectStatesCreator.class
080                .equals(client.getJSON().getGson()
081                    .getAdapter(K8sObjectStates.class).getClass());
082    }
083
084    /**
085     * Gets the group.
086     *
087     * @return the group
088     */
089    public String group() {
090        return group;
091    }
092
093    /**
094     * Gets the version.
095     *
096     * @return the version
097     */
098    public String version() {
099        return version;
100    }
101
102    /**
103     * Gets the kind.
104     *
105     * @return the kind
106     */
107    public String kind() {
108        return kind;
109    }
110
111    /**
112     * Gets the plural.
113     *
114     * @return the plural
115     */
116    public String plural() {
117        return plural;
118    }
119
120    /**
121     * Gets the namespace.
122     *
123     * @return the namespace
124     */
125    public String namespace() {
126        return namespace;
127    }
128
129    /**
130     * Gets the name.
131     *
132     * @return the name
133     */
134    public String name() {
135        return name;
136    }
137
138    /**
139     * Get a namespaced custom object stub. If the version in parameter
140     * `gvk` is an empty string, the stub refers to the first object with
141     * matching group and kind. 
142     *
143     * @param client the client
144     * @param gvk the group, version and kind
145     * @param namespace the namespace
146     * @param name the name
147     * @return the stub if the object exists
148     * @throws ApiException the api exception
149     */
150    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidBranchingStatementAsLastInLoop",
151        "PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops", "PMD.UseObjectForClearerAPI" })
152    public static Optional<K8sObjectStub>
153            get(ApiClient client, GroupVersionKind gvk,
154                    String namespace, String name) throws ApiException {
155        var group = gvk.getGroup();
156        var kind = gvk.getKind();
157        var version = gvk.getVersion();
158        var apiMatch = new Discovery(client).findAll().stream()
159            .filter(r -> r.getGroup().equals(group) && r.getKind().equals(kind)
160                && (Strings.isNullOrEmpty(version)
161                    || r.getVersions().contains(version)))
162            .findFirst();
163        if (apiMatch.isEmpty()) {
164            return Optional.empty();
165        }
166        var apiRes = apiMatch.get();
167        var finalVersion = Strings.isNullOrEmpty(version)
168            ? apiRes.getVersions().get(0)
169            : version;
170        return Optional
171            .of(new K8sObjectStub(client, group, finalVersion, apiRes.getKind(),
172                apiRes.getResourcePlural(), namespace, name));
173    }
174
175    /**
176     * Retrieves and returns the current state of the object.
177     *
178     * @return the object's state
179     * @throws ApiException the api exception
180     */
181    public K8sObjectState state() throws ApiException {
182        var response = api.get(namespace, name).throwsApiException();
183        return response.getObject();
184    }
185
186    /**
187     * Updates the object's status.
188     *
189     * @param object the current state of the object (passed to `status`)
190     * @param status function that returns the new status
191     * @return the kubernetes api response
192     * @throws ApiException the api exception
193     */
194    public KubernetesApiResponse<K8sObjectState>
195            updateStatus(K8sObjectState object,
196                    Function<K8sObjectState, Object> status)
197                    throws ApiException {
198        return api.updateStatus(object, status).throwsApiException();
199    }
200
201    /**
202     * Updates the status.
203     *
204     * @param status the status
205     * @return the kubernetes api response
206     * @throws ApiException the api exception
207     */
208    public KubernetesApiResponse<K8sObjectState>
209            updateStatus(Function<K8sObjectState, Object> status)
210                    throws ApiException {
211        return updateStatus(
212            api.get(namespace, name).throwsApiException().getObject(), status);
213    }
214
215    /**
216     * Patch the object.
217     *
218     * @param patchType the patch type
219     * @param patch the patch
220     * @param options the options
221     * @return the kubernetes api response
222     * @throws ApiException the api exception
223     */
224    public KubernetesApiResponse<K8sObjectState> patch(
225            String patchType, V1Patch patch, PatchOptions options)
226            throws ApiException {
227        return api.patch(namespace, name, patchType, patch, options)
228            .throwsApiException();
229    }
230
231    /**
232     * Patch the object using default options.
233     *
234     * @param patchType the patch type
235     * @param patch the patch
236     * @return the kubernetes api response
237     * @throws ApiException the api exception
238     */
239    public KubernetesApiResponse<K8sObjectState>
240            patch(String patchType, V1Patch patch) throws ApiException {
241        PatchOptions opts = new PatchOptions();
242        return patch(patchType, patch, opts);
243    }
244}
